# scm_label (Data Source)

Label data source



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The UUID of the label

### Optional

- `name` (String) The name of the label

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the label
- `tfid` (String) The Terraform ID.
